title: Handwritten Typeface Recommendations
content:
\<font class="dontLookLikeCrap"\>Hi Typos,   
   
Looking for a casual, friendly handwritten face for a tourist industry design. A kind of "Wish you were here" on the postcard sort of thing.   
   
Also may need to have a somewhat thicker stroke width than your average handwritten face to ensure good legibility on screen and/or when layered over photographs with bright/tropical colors.   
   
Cheers,   
   
 -t\</font\>
author: timfm

comments.content:
Oooh, Comic Sans is "real purty" ;)   
   
In fact is was you, Mr. Coles, who posted a fine list of handwritten faces in this thread -- thank you.   
   
 [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/14521.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125095719/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/14521.html)
